articles.title: Exploring JavaScript
articles.description: A comprehensive guide to modern JavaScript practices.
articles.content: JavaScript has become the most popular language in web development. This article explores various modern practices and tools to enhance your JS skills.

articles.title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
articles.description: Understanding the differences between CSS Grid and Flexbox.
articles.content: CSS Grid and Flexbox are powerful layout systems in CSS. This article helps you understand their differences and when to use each.

articles.title: Getting Started with React
articles.description: An introduction to building applications with React.
articles.content: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. This guide helps you get started with the basics of React.

articles.title: Mastering Python
articles.description: Advanced Python techniques and best practices.
articles.content: Python is a versatile language used in various domains. This article covers advanced techniques to master Python programming.

articles.title: Introduction to Docker
articles.description: Getting started with Docker containers for development.
articles.content: Docker has revolutionized software development by enabling containerization. This guide introduces Docker and how to use it for your projects.
